short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Convert a number in any base to any other base

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Convert a number in any base to any other base. Comes preloaded with binary, octal, decimal, dozenal, and hexadecimal. Users can also create new bases and save them. The user can also highlight a number on a website and right click to see a conversion option. 

Has various optional features, including a European mode(1.234.567,89), two dozenal output character sets to choose from, and more.
